articles.title: Trump indictment live updates and latest news
articles.description: President Donald Trump was indicted by a New York grand jury in a hush money case, and is expected to be arraigned on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Donald Trump became the first former U.S. president to get indicted on Thursday.
Now the country awaits more details on what charges exactly Trump faces in the New York hush money case — and when he will head to Manhattan to turn himself in.

articles.title: Migraines, cluster headaches linked to how you sleep: study
articles.description: A recent study found that migraines and cluster headaches are linked to the body's circadian rhythm and how one sleeps — which has been found to impact a long list of health disorders.
articles.content:
Is it headache o’clock?
Migraines and cluster headaches are closely linked to the body’s internal clock, a new study found.
The report, published in Neurology on Wednesday, suggested that both types of headaches have strong correlations to the circad... [3649 chars]

articles.title: Army IDs 9 Soldiers from 101st Airborne Killed in Black Hawk Crashes in Kentucky
articles.description: The two helicopters were from the 101st Combat Aviation Brigade, 101st Airborne, and were conducting a routine training exercise flying at night with the pilots wearing night vision devices.
articles.content:
The Army on Friday identified the nine soldiers killed in a crash involving two Black Hawk helicopters Wednesday evening in southwestern Kentucky.

articles.title: Judge won't declare early winner in Dominion defamation case against Fox News, paving way for trial over 2020 election lies
articles.description: Dominion Voting Systems' historic defamation case against Fox News will proceed to a high-stakes jury trial next month, a Delaware judge ruled Friday, declining to declare a pretrial winner.
articles.content:
New York CNN —
Dominion Voting Systems’ historic defamation case against Fox News will proceed to a high-stakes jury trial next month, a Delaware judge ruled Friday, declining to declare a pretrial winner.

articles.title: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Netflix, which has been home to executive Lisa Nishimura for 15 years, has kicked off its austerity measures with her exit.
articles.content:
With the exit of long-tenured film executive Lisa Nishimura on Thursday, Netflix has officially entered its austerity age — whatever that may mean for the streaming powerhouse.

articles.title: Scientists May Have Found the Culprit Behind Mysterious Hepatitis Outbreaks in Kids
articles.description: Three independent teams in the U.S. and UK have published evidence this week pointing to a common virus.
articles.content: Several teams of scientists believe they have uncovered the likely cause of a mysterious surge of severe hepatitis last year that hospitalized and killed children around the world. In three studies published this week, the groups detail evidence that... [5252 chars]

articles.title: Social Security will not be able to pay full benefits in 2034 if Congress doesn't act
articles.description: Americans' Social Security checks will get a lot smaller in 2034 if lawmakers don't act to address the pending shortfall, according to an annual report released Friday by the Social Security trustees.
articles.content:
CNN —
Americans’ Social Security checks will get a lot smaller in 2034 if lawmakers don’t act to address the pending shortfall, according to an annual report released Friday by the Social Security trustees.
